title: Lost Ark Tier List
description: This tier list is based on the current meta and may change as the game evolves. It also takes into account both PvE and PvP content.
heading: Lost Ark Tier List
introText: This tier list is based on the current meta and may change as the game evolves. It also takes into account both PvE and PvP content.

data.itemDescription: The Sorceress is one of the highest damage dealers in the game, and she has a good amount of range and AoE skills. She is also relatively easy to learn, but she can be squishy if you're not careful

The Berserker is a melee DPS class that is known for his high damage output and berserker mode. He is a bit more difficult to learn than some other classes, but he can be very rewarding if you master him
The Artillerist is a ranged DPS class that deals high damage with his bombs and grenades. He is also very mobile, which makes him a good choice for players who like to avoid taking damage
The Wardancer is a support class that can also deal decent damage. She is a good choice for players who want to support their team while still being able to contribute to the fight
The Paladin is another support class that is known for his survivability and crowd control abilities. He is a good choice for players who want to keep their team alive
The Gunslinger is a ranged DPS class that deals damage with a variety of guns. She is a bit more difficult to learn than some other classes, but she can be very rewarding if you master her
The Scrapper is a melee DPS class that is known for her high damage output and mobility. She is a bit more difficult to learn than some other classes, but she can be very rewarding if you master her
The Destroyer is a melee DPS class that is known for his high damage output and tankiness. He is a bit slow and immobile, but he can take a lot of punishment
The Deathblade is a melee DPS class that is known for her high burst damage and mobility. She is a bit squishy, but she can deal a lot of damage in a short amount of time
The Machinist is a ranged DPS class that deals damage with a variety of gadgets. He is a bit difficult to learn, and he is not as powerful as some other DPS classes
The Sharpshooter is a ranged DPS class that deals damage with his bow. He is a bit slow and immobile, and he is not as powerful as some other DPS classes

The Soulfist is a melee DPS class that is known for her unique playstyle. She can switch between two stances, one for dealing damage and one for healing. She is a bit difficult to learn, and she is not as powerful as some other DPS classes
